title: French VOGUE
content:
Could somebody please identify this font in French Vogue - both the big "G" and the text? The text is hard to see in this photo so I'm not sure if that's possible unless someone is already familiar with it.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/joshboston/2282476500/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100605025340/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joshboston/2282476500/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/joshboston/2282476500/")

Thank you.
author: Lisa H

comments.content: I think the big G is customized Caslon, and the text is Caslon.
Thank you. I can see the text as Caslon, but the big G too? I can't see it but I'm new to all this.
